phrs.translation: 佩恩, 潘恩, 锤的尖头

sentences.sentence: Pein:... You are wrong, I didn't do anything.
sentences.translation: 佩因：…你错了，我什么都没有做。

sentences.sentence: Of course you have your cross and straight pein hammer.
sentences.translation: 当然你有你的交叉和直苹锤子。

sentences.sentence: Added Only the head and one attached to an Body of Pein.
sentences.translation: 新增只有头和一个附加到身体的石工。
